alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 7:03PM AKDT until March 15 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Additional snow accumulations less than one inch. Northerly winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibility less than one half mile at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst conditions are near the Bering Strait. Winds are expected to decrease gradually on Wednesday and conditions will improve then. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. &&

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
